name: Option
description:
Made for the JTAGame Jam #4 In 4 days!

Hi, I am Seymur from Azerbaijan.I am 13 years old,in this game you have 2 options 

1. Wizard  2.Shotter 

you can choose any of them.By the way, this game is hard.

How does this game use the tutorial? same code with animations. How does this game fit the theme?
You can choose gun.

I hope you will like this game .

Good Luck!
